audit_form.instructions_header: Fill in the evaluation information below
audit_form.page_url: The address of the evaluated website
audit_form.question: Question

audit_posting.subheader_notice: This page won't be evaluated. If you want it to be evaluated add it as a subpage.
audit_posting.description: Short description of the site, it's content
audit_posting.subpage_header: The address of the evaluated subpage
audit_posting.subpage_desc: Here you can describe the purpose and functions of the page as well as  things you'd like the evaluation to focus on.

audit_report.description: This describes better what the evaluation consist of

info.info-l1: The aim of Accessor is to connect companies and organizations, who want their site to be accessible to those, who know what accessibility means.
info.info-l2: Our ultimate goal is to include people with disabilities in the process of designing and producing web services.
info.info-l3: Let's make the web accessible for all!

landing_page.description: We make reliable webservice's accessibility evaluation possible. Our goal is to make the web accessible for all.
landing_page.poster_button: I need accessibility evaluation for my website
